overview:
Shai Schiller is a turnaround hands on expert active in the Israeli high technology arena.

Shai was one of the first employees at Comverse and managed asia pacific as well as the Intelligent Netwrok Division. He lived in the US for 7 yearts and in Hong Kong for 5.

Shai went on to be the CEO of the Emblaze group and led fund raisings in access of 600M dollars.

later Shai became a general partenr at Concord ventures and was active in the VC scene for 5 years.

Today shai is managing turnaround as active chairman and CEO. Amonsgt the companies He was involved with are: Neurovision, Axismobile, BlogTv, Parrot-media and more.

Shai has a BSc in Computer Science and MBA.
